title: Proposal process - Business rules
content:
In the out-of-the-box proposal workflow, the following business rules apply to the indicated metaphase or phase.

Proposal process - all phases

Event Condition Service Management action
After change
  • Created by is changed and isn't empty
  • Owned by is empty
 Owned By = Created by
None

Validate:

  • Review decision is empty, or
  • Review decision isn't empty and Review feedback isn't empty

Display the proposal workflow error message in case of a failure
Phase Id is Review Validate:
  • Cost, Business value, and Risk rating aren't empty

Display the proposal workflow error message in case of a failure
  • The metaphase is Assessment
  • Task plan for review is rejected
  • Phase Id = Close
  • Review decision = Reject
  • Review feedback =Rejected
None Validate:
  • Risk rating is empty, or
  • Risk rating > 0 and <= 100

Display the proposal workflow error message in case of a failure

Disable Priority

Event Condition Action
Entering Created by is empty Created by = Current user ID
